title: A deep decarbonization framework for the United States economy – a sector, sub-sector, and end-use based approach
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1024-1039
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE00807J, Paper
Open Access

Saurajyoti Kar, Troy R. Hawkins, George G. Zaimes, Doris Oke, Udayan Singh, Xinyi Wu, Hoyoung Kwon, Shannon Zhang, Guiyan Zang, Yan Zhou, Amgad Elgowainy, Michael Wang, Ookie Ma
Achieving the United States' target of net-zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2050 will require technological transformations and energy sector migration.
